meanings.definition: The quality or state of being neat.
meanings.sent1: Her room's neatness impressed her parents.
meanings.sent2: She always admired the neatness of his handwriting.
meanings.sent3: The neatness of the cat's grooming routine was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: The neatness of the garden resembled a perfectly arranged painting.
meanings.sent5: The neatness of the library made it a peaceful sanctuary for book lovers.

meanings.definition: Orderliness and tidiness in appearance or arrangement.
meanings.sent1: The neatness of his desk made it easy to find things.
meanings.sent2: The neatness of the classroom made it a pleasant learning environment.
meanings.sent3: The neatness of the puzzle pieces made it satisfying to put them together.
meanings.sent4: The neatness of the city streets after the parade was a welcome sight.
meanings.sent5: The neatness of her outfit made her stand out at the party.
